to.speech: Correct grammar is <break time="0.2s" /> to whom.

little old lady.speech: I didn't know you could yodel!
little old lady.text: I didn't know you could yodel!

boo.speech: Aww <break time="0.3s" /> it's okay <break time="0.3s" /> don't cry.

woo.speech: Don't get so excited, it's just a joke.
